scripts.build:android: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:EAS_NO_VCS=1; npx eas-cli build --platform android --profile preview"
scripts.build:android:production: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:EAS_NO_VCS=1; npx eas-cli build --platform android --profile production"
scripts.build:android:local: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:EAS_NO_VCS=1; npx eas-cli build --platform android --local --profile preview"
scripts.build:ios: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:EAS_NO_VCS=1; npx eas-cli build --platform ios --profile preview"
scripts.build:ios:production: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$env:EAS_NO_VCS=1; npx eas-cli build --platform ios --profile production"
scripts.clean:build: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path android/app/build) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force android/app/build }; if (Test-Path android/build) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force android/build }; if (Test-Path android/.gradle) { Remove-Item -Recurse -Force android/.gradle }"
